batalande pawathi raswim walin sakachcha karanu labu karunu nithi wirodhi eewa bawa yamekuta elambaiya haki ekama nigamanaya wanu athayi kiya siti komisama awasara nolath raswimwaladi kadakappalkari mardhana katayuthu sambandhayen polisiye kriya kalapayata ranil wikramasinha upades di athayida ebadu niyamayan kirimata naithika balayak nomathi athara ee sambandhayen ohu thama balaya ayatha lesa pawichichi kara athayida kiya sitiyeya.
kolambaa rajakiya widuhale kalidu chethika wikramasinha ha galla sawuthland...
sanwardhanaya maninu labana prakata minum kihipayak pilibanda sarala wimasumak.
ewita janathawa oba samaga sitinu noanu manaya.
meka sanwedi prashnayak...
komiyunist paksha nayakayanta sabama hisaradayak wuye ema thaththwayayi.
"bariwelawath me prapathaya uda di kochchiyak pili pannoth eeka adi dahak withara pahalata peralila minissuth ekkama kudu pattam wela pahala gamwalatath wishala winashayak wenawa neda?"
enisa sathuran handuna ganimatath, udin inna minisa yatin inna thirisana ho dewiya handuna ganimatath ek athakata meya upakari we.
nand rahula dedenata himi wa thupu sapatha ya.
ithin me prashnayata baladharin wisin uththarayak hoya gannakam….

ehidi kandayame boho pirimi sathun athara satana athiwana athara awasanayedi wadi kaya shakthiyakin yuthu wu satha pramukhaya nathinam nayakaya wana athara, pasuwa ohu wisin rale anek sathunta pida kirima sidu karayi.
nirmanayaka sulamula soya yama
shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaya}}
ow mama wadiya prasiddha nama damme.
pariganakaya osse pamanak nowa tablat, smat fon aadiyenuth tharaga narambaanna obata ek wenna puluwan.
in pasuwa adhikarana waidya niladhari che. si. samarawira mahatha ethanata aawa.
dawasa suba dawasak.
wimarshana pama kirima, wartha yata gasima, sakshikaruwanta balapam sidu kirima yana siyalla siduwanne me jalaya osse yayi sithannata puluwana.
me athara amarikanu hamudawa thula da asahanakari kriyadamayan nisa diwi nasa ganim wadiwi thibe.
ethan sita mama boho wenaskam dakala thiyenawa.
upasakayekgen/ upasikawakagen ahala baluwath apita ahanna labenne me wage prakasha, 'ee pujawa nam harima hondayi.
ee minisage krushikarmika himidiriyen wasara 12000kata pamana pasuwa.

ada api ek yodha alak gana pamanak katha kalath, rajarata pura diyawara aaraksha karana sankirna aarakshaka paddhathiyak lesin yodha ala sankalpaya kriyathmaka wu bawa peni yanne ganga, waw, droni sambandha karamin nimawu yodha alawal kihipayak gana kiyawena heyini.
"sara sonduru mal patali" kiyana githaya.
mage lipiyedi ma anumana kala lesama chayarupa kipayakama siti sudu jathika kanthawage samiya thamayi me watina kiyana chayarupa siyallema himikaruwa.
ayata ostin, sunil, chandra, mahinda, swarna yana soyuru soyuriyo wuha.

shri lankawe pawathina nithiya anuwa ema kisidu bhandayak welandapolata nikuthkirima thahanam kirimata thama adhikariyata balaya pawara athi bawath, ema bhanda nishpadanaya kala samagamata nawatha harawa yawimata piyawara ganna lesata shri lanka waraya reguwata thama adhikariya wisin likhithawa danwa yawu bawath ee mahatha wadiduuratath awadharanaya kaleya.

gresful kalu anduma.

wawuniyawa pradeshiya lekam kottasaye saha nidangatha wakugadu rogayata darunu lesa goduru wi athi wawuniyawa dakuna ha cheddikulam yana pradeshiya lekam kottasawala wesena janathawata saukhyarakshitha paniya jalaya sapayime pradhana aramunin wisal wawuniya jala sampadana wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kirimata yojana wi thibe.
